title: Understanding and Practicing Single Image Super-Resolution (SISR) Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic deep learning concepts, fundamental principles of image processing, and understanding of CNN/RNN architectures
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized LMS accessible via smartphones, without real-time video conferencing tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain super-resolution model performance evaluation methods using PSNR/SSIM metrics.
Learners can comparatively analyze structural differences and application cases of GAN/CNN-based SISR models.
Learners can propose lightweight SISR model design strategies optimized for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
